title: CON 598 Construction Estimate & Bid Proposal (San Pedro River Bridge Replacement
description: Prepared a complete $7.1M ADOT-compliant bridge bid including quantity takeoffs, subcontractor analysis, risk contingencies, bonding, and InEight-based estimate documentation.

title: CON 534 Retrofit Opportunities Assessment
description: Evaluated retrofit options for a 254,000 ftÂ² occupied facility by assessing existing systems and developing phased scopes, cost estimates, and feasibility-based recommendations.

title: CON 545 Construction Operation Study
description: Analyzed field productivity on a 15-story high-rise using work sampling and MPDM to optimize site logistics, safety planning, and crew efficiency.

title: CON 598 Drone Technology for the Built Environment
description: This project demonstrates the use of drone technology to capture aerial site data and analyze construction progress, site logistics, safety conditions, and earthwork status through time-lapse and annotated video outputs

title: CON 598 AI in Construction
description: Built an AI-enhanced dashboard that summarizes work orders, enriches records with weather data, visualizes KPIs and an interactive map, and automatically emails periodic summary reports.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather application that displays current conditions and forecasts using data from a weather API with location-based searches.
